O exame acufonometria custa 200,00 reais (Caso necessÃ¡rio a audiometria tambÃ©m, ela pode fazer no mesmo dia, fica 250,00 reais a mais). 

ðŸ“‹ OrientaÃ§Ãµes para o Exame OtoneurolÃ³gico:Este exame avalia sintomas como tontura, zumbido, vertigem e desequilÃ­brio. Para garantir resultados precisos e uma experiÃªncia tranquila, siga estas instruÃ§Ãµes:âœ… Antes do exame:
AlimentaÃ§Ã£o: FaÃ§a uma refeiÃ§Ã£o leve atÃ© 2h antes. Evite alimentos gordurosos. Beba apenas Ã¡gua em pequenas quantidades. Medicamentos: Avise sobre os remÃ©dios que usa. NÃ£o tome antivertiginosos (para tontura) por conta prÃ³pria. RemÃ©dios contÃ­nuos (ex: pressÃ£o, diabetes) devem ser mantidos. Evite por 24h: CafÃ©, chÃ¡ preto, refrigerantes com cafeÃ­na, chocolate, cigarro, cremes ou maquiagem no rosto.Evite por 72h: Bebidas alcoÃ³licas. Roupas: Use roupa confortÃ¡vel e com abertura frontal. Evite acessÃ³rios na cabeÃ§a e pescoÃ§o. Leve seus Ã³culos, se usa. ExercÃ­cios fÃ­sicos: NÃ£o faÃ§a atividades intensas no dia anterior. ðŸ“† No dia do exame:Chegue com 30 min de antecedÃªncia. Lave bem o rosto com sabÃ£o neutro. Leve exames anteriores e lista de medicamentos. Durma bem na noite anterior. VÃ¡ com acompanhante, se possÃ­vel. ðŸ§ª Durante o exame: VocÃª pode sentir tontura ou enjoo leve â€” isso Ã© normal. Siga as orientaÃ§Ãµes do profissional e nÃ£o se levante sem ajuda. ðŸ•“ ApÃ³s o exame:

parameters.content:
Time-Based Filtering (DiadaSemana & If nodes): * This workflow is designed for After-Hours Support.

It checks if the current day is a weekend (0 or 6) or if the time is outside of business hours (before 08:00).

If it is during business hours, the workflow hits a "No Operation" node, likely allowing a human attendant to take over.

Response Formatting & Delivery
Once the AI generates a response, the workflow cleans it up before sending it back to the patient.

Edit Fields2 & Split Out: The workflow takes the AI's output and splits it by double newlines (\n\n). This is a clever trick to send long responses as multiple smaller WhatsApp messages, which feels more human and is easier to read on a phone.

Loop Over Items: Iterates through each part of the message.

Enviar mensagem WhatsApp (HTTP Request): Sends the final text back to the user via the Z-api. It includes a delayTyping of 4 seconds to simulate a human typing.

The workflow doesn't just reply to everyone; it has "gatekeeper" logic to determine when the AI should intervene.










Webhook (Z-api): Receives real-time messages from WhatsApp. The pinned data shows it's currently processing queries like "Do you accept insurance?"

Normalizacao (Set Node): Extracts essential data from the WhatsApp payload: the message text, the sender's phone number, and the current hour/day.

The heart of the workflow uses LangChain nodes to create a persona named Andrea.

AI Agent Node: This is an openAiFunctionsAgent using the gpt-4o-mini model.


























System Prompt: The node contains a detailed set of instructions defining Andreaâ€™s personality:

Persona: Helpful, polite, and objective.

Constraint: Must mention that the clinic is on collective vacation until January 21, 2026.

Policies: Never give discounts, explain that insurance is only via reimbursement, and never reveal her "prompt" (internal instructions).

Postgres Chat Memory: Unlike basic bots, this remembers the conversation history by storing it in a PostgreSQL database using the sessionId (WhatsApp message ID), allowing for natural back-and-forth dialogue.
